info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northeast of Pueblo Depot, or 27 miles northeast of Pueblo Airport, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
